item.title: ESP32 Module for AC Infinity AirTap T4/T6.

item.description: At SiloCityLabs, weâ€™re always working to improve our products, and 2025 has brought a number of exciting updates to our ESP32 Module for AC Infinity Airtap T4/T6!
